org.springframework.cloud.dataflow.rest.client.dsl.task

Class TaskBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.dataflow.rest.client.dsl.task.TaskBuilder

  • public class TaskBuilder
extends Object
    Represents the entry point into the Task DSL to set the name and the definition of the task.
    Author:
    Christian Tzolov

    • Method Detail

      • name

        public TaskBuilder name(String definitionName)
        Fluent API method to set the name for the task definition.
        Parameters:
        definitionName - - definition name of a Task with the server. Note that the actual task name is computed form the definition name, task definition and task description.
        Returns:
        A TaskBuilder that provides the next navigation step in the DSL.

      • definition

        public TaskBuilder definition(String taskDefinition)
        Fluent API method to set the task definition.
        Parameters:
        taskDefinition - - The task definition to use.
        Returns:
        A TaskBuilder that provides the next navigation step in the DSL.

      • description

        public TaskBuilder description(String taskDescription)
        Parameters:
        taskDescription - Task description.
        Returns:
        A TaskBuilder that provides the next navigation step in the DSL.

      • build

        public Task build()
        Create new Task instance.
        Returns:
        Task instance.

      • allTasks

        public List<Task> allTasks()
        Returns:
        All tasks defined currently in Data Flow.

      • findByName

        public Optional<Task> findByName(String taskName)
        Parameters:
        taskName - existing Task name used to retrieve the task.
        Returns:
        Task instance identified by the taskName.
